title: Capricorn

nouns: One of the constellations of the zodiac
A faint zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Sagittarius and Aquarius
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
Capricornus is one of the constellations of the zodiac; it is often called Capricorn, especially when referring to the corresponding astrological sign.
Capricorn is the tenth astrological sign in the zodiac, originating from the constellation of Capricornus.

description: The Capricorn astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Goat.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Capricorn emoji is a majestic representation of the sea-goat, depicted with the constellation's iconic horns and a graceful, flowing tail. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give it a luminous quality, making the celestial creature appear both powerful and enigmatic. This emoji, as seen across Apple devices, symbolizes ambition, discipline, and resilience, embodying the spirit of those born under this zodiac sign.
